name: Master Sportsman Fishing Life Vest, Taupe

reviews.name: Master Sportsman Fishing Life Vest, Taupe
reviews.reviewText:
I needed something quick and easy for kayak fishing. The fit is great. A half vest fit perfect for kayaking. the two large pockets (with zippers - decent ones) are large enough to hold small tackle boxes for small plugs. The rest of the pockets have served me fine for plastic worms in their ziploc bags and bobbers and such.

That said, the material is quite thin, and the velcro that holds shut the small pockets is sub standard.
I chose to install snap closures to mine, since I'm carrying extra spools for my fishing reels, and I don't want them getting lost due to a roll over.

The fit is great and very breathable. does not limit motion at all. Very easy to forget your wearing it.

I have only used it twice and have not had a chance to try its buoyancy, but I'm sure that is a non issue.

Overall a great product that can serve you well if your kayaking or boating.
reviews.title: Good for the price

reviews.name: Master Sportsman Fishing Life Vest, Taupe
reviews.reviewText: With lots of pockets, this vest is great for kayak fishing.
reviews.title: Perfect kayak PFD

reviews.name: Master Sportsman Fishing Life Vest, Taupe
reviews.reviewText: The vest fits nicely and able to cast without restrictions. Had to get use to it at first but then it was like I wasn't wearing it. Has lots of pockets for storing things. D-rings are nice and will try it out with my waders later for trout fishing.
reviews.title: Nice Vest for fishing or hunting near water

reviews.name: Master Sportsman Fishing Life Vest, Taupe
reviews.reviewText: I bought this vest because I liked the pockets, color, and the mesh to keep cool. I was concerned at first having ordered a size L/XL because I'm a bit skinny( 6'1" and 150 lbs) it was big when I first put it on but luckily the straps tightened the vest up nice and snug- perfect fit. The D rings on the bottom are perfect for attaching leashes to hold various things so you don't lose them in the water. You can't buy a vest this nice anywhere else for under 50$. Great buy!
reviews.title: Kayaking in style!

reviews.name: Master Sportsman Fishing Life Vest, Taupe
reviews.reviewText: I enjoy wade fishing with a fly rod. This vest is comfortable (especially the padded neck) and offers plenty of range of motion while casting. Lots of pockets for all of my fly boxes and other paraphernalia that I normally bring along but never use.....admit it, you know you do it too. Would definitely recommend to a friend - so go get you one!
reviews.title: Great life jacket for the fisherman!
